mapper.select: select eb.sn from t_electricity_cabinet as ec left join t_electricity_cabinet_box as ecb on ec.id=ecb.electricity_cabinet_id left join t_electricity_battery as eb on ecb.electricity_battery_id is not null and ecb.electricity_battery_id=eb.id where eb.power>=fully_charged and ec.id = #{id} and ecb.usable_status =0
